entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
